mapper.sql: attemptID, instanceID, taskID, startTime, endTime, scheduleTime, status, returnValue, execHost
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from TaurusTaskAttempt
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into TaurusTaskAttempt
attemptID,
instanceID,
taskID,
startTime,
endTime,
scheduleTime,
status,
returnValue,
execHost,
#{attemptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{instanceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{taskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{scheduletime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{returnvalue,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{exechost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: select count(*) from TaurusTaskAttempt
mapper.update:
update TaurusTaskAttempt
attemptID = #{record.attemptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
instanceID = #{record.instanceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
taskID = #{record.taskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
startTime = #{record.starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endTime = #{record.endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
scheduleTime = #{record.scheduletime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
returnValue = #{record.returnvalue,jdbcType=INTEGER},
execHost = #{record.exechost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update TaurusTaskAttempt set attemptID = #{record.attemptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, instanceID = #{record.instanceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, taskID = #{record.taskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startTime = #{record.starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endTime = #{record.endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, scheduleTime = #{record.scheduletime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, returnValue = #{record.returnvalue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, execHost = #{record.exechost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TaurusTaskAttempt
instanceID = #{instanceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
taskID = #{taskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
startTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
scheduleTime = #{scheduletime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
returnValue = #{returnvalue,jdbcType=INTEGER},
execHost = #{exechost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where attemptID = #{attemptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TaurusTaskAttempt set instanceID = #{instanceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, taskID = #{taskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, scheduleTime = #{scheduletime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, returnValue = #{returnvalue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, execHost = #{exechost,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where attemptID = #{attemptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from (select * from TaurusTaskAttempt where status = 1 or status = 3 order by startTime asc) atms group by taskID
select * from TaurusTaskAttempt where attemptid = #{attemptId}
select * from TaurusTaskAttempt where status = #{status} order by scheduletime asc

select
from TaurusTaskAttempt where ( (startTime >= #{now} and endTime >= #{now}) and status != 7) or status = 6
select execHost,count(1) as totaltask from TaurusTaskAttempt where startTime >=#{start} and startTime <=#{end} group by execHost order by totaltask desc
select execHost,count(1) as totaltask from TaurusTaskAttempt where status=6 group by execHost order by totaltask desc
select execHost,count(1) as totaltask from TaurusTaskAttempt where startTime >=#{start} and startTime <=#{end} and status=8 group by execHost order by totaltask desc

select a.name,a.taskID,count(1) AS num ,a.creator from TaurusTask a join TaurusTaskAttempt b on a.taskID=b.taskID where a.creator=#{user} and b.status = #{status, typeHandler=com.dp.bigdata.taurus.generated.module.InHandler} and b.startTime >=#{start} and startTime <= #{end} group by a.name

select d.name,d.taskID,count(1) as num,d.creator from ( select a.*,b.groupID from ( select a.taskID,a.creator,a.name,b.id as userID ,c.status from TaurusTask a join TaurusUser b on a.creator=b.name join TaurusTaskAttempt c on a.taskID=c.taskID where c.startTime >=#{start}and c.startTime <= #{end} and c.status = #{status, typeHandler=com.dp.bigdata.taurus.generated.module.InHandler} ) a join TaurusUserGroupMapping b on a.userID=b.userID
where groupID in( select b.groupID from TaurusUser a join TaurusUserGroupMapping b on a.id=b.userID and a.name=#{user} ) )d group by d.name,d.creator

select f.name,f.taskID,count(1) as num,f.creator from ( select a.* from ( select a.taskID,a.creator,a.name, b.id as userID ,c.status from TaurusTask a join TaurusUser b on a.creator=b.name join TaurusTaskAttempt c on a.taskID=c.taskID where c.startTime >=#{start}and c.startTime <= #{end} and c.status =#{status, typeHandler=com.dp.bigdata.taurus.generated.module.InHandler} ) a
)f group by f.name,f.creator
mapper.delete: delete from TaurusTaskAttempt where taskID = #{taskId} and status = #{status}
mapper.select: SELECT * from TaurusTaskAttempt where taskID = #{taskId} and status = #{status}
select taskID from TaurusTaskAttempt where taskID = #{taskId} limit 1
select TaurusTaskAttempt.taskID from TaurusTaskAttempt where TaurusTaskAttempt.status = 6 and TaurusTaskAttempt.taskID = #{taskId} limit 1
select status from TaurusTaskAttempt where taskID = #{taskId} order by startTime desc limit 1
select * from TaurusTaskAttempt where execHost = #{ip} and startTime > #{time}
select * from TaurusTaskAttempt where endTime <= #{endTime} and startTime > #{startTime}
